mng: to string together, to skewer, to connect wrongly, to gang up, to rove, string, bunch, skewer, classifier for things that are strung together, or in a bunch, or in a row: string of, bunch of, series of, to make a swift or abrupt linear movement (like a bead on an abacus), to move across

exm.mng: a succession of, a series of
to establish ties or contact, in series connection (electricity)
to call on sb, to drop in, to visit sb's home
amateur player in theater, guest performer (in a show), guest appearance (in film credits)
to collude, to collaborate, to gang up
to miss a line, to confuse two lines
